name: Yuko: tragic love story
description:
This is a tragic love story of the protagonist Yuko. The main events unfold in the city park, where Yuko finds her girlfriend.

You immerse yourself in the emotional world, where you will pass all the stages of the development of relations. Love, separation, suffering, all this you have to go through with the main character.Features
  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • Nonlinear text with different storylines;
  • Story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Multiple routes and choices that affect the ending;
  • Steam achievements.
